title: Abraham Lincoln: a background study
brief_description: The life of Abraham Lincoln, 16th President of the United States. Describes the difficulties of his early life, through his early political career and his terms as president during the American Civil War.
description: The life of Abraham Lincoln, 16th President of the United States. Describes the difficulties of his early life, through his early political career and his terms as president during the American Civil War.
